title: Android Link Preview
content: This a version for Android of my web Link Preview . How to use with Gradle Simply add the repository to your build.gradle file: repositories { jcenter() maven { url 'https://github.com/leonardocardoso/mvn-repo/raw/master/maven-deploy' } } And you can use the artifacts like this: dependencies { compile 'com.leocardz:link-preview:1.1@aar' // ... } Like the php version, it makes a preview from an url, grabbing all the information such as title, relevant texts and images. It works even with shortened urls, image urls, etc... Watch a video of its work!
